Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Amberton Lane, west of the Knightly Order of the Black Cross and east of Altihmin's Academy of Advanced Fighting Techniques.
Room.LongDescription: Altihmin's Academy is reserved for only the most powerful of fighters in the realm. He trains fighters to be powerful leaders and even more powerful on the battlefield. On the east side of the road is the Knightly Order of the Black Cross, the dark side which all paladins must enter and overcome.
